show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Polyanna’s Day Out On Parade
content:
Analysis and deconstruction of a mainstream article talking up the economy and the markets. <!--more--> Beware seductive-sounding bytes that are meaningless and out-to-deceive.
Happiness as relates to money.
Some advice on how to spend it to derive the greatest happiness.
Some interesting background information on Ferguson, MO.
The housing melt-down in China has arrived.
Some of the most absurd college courses on offer today.
A bill currently going through Congress would ban the purchase of body armor.
Hard to believe, really, isn’t it?
More bearish news on real estate.
